qas.question: What kind of referees are occasionally used?

answers.text: Special guest referees may be used from time to time;

qas.question: What are famous referees directed to do?

answers.text: often scripted to dispense with the appearance of neutrality and use their influence to unfairly influence the outcome of the match for added dramatic impact. F

qas.question: What do special referees have the ability to do?

answers.text: They also have the power to eject from ringside any of the heel wrestler's entourage/stable, who may otherwise interfere with the match.

context: <a0_0>Special guest referees may be used from time to time;<a0_0/> by virtue of their celebrity status, they are <a1_0>often scripted to dispense with the appearance of neutrality and use their influence to unfairly influence the outcome of the match for added dramatic impact. F<a1_0/>ace special referees will often fight back against hostile heel wrestlers, particularly if the special referee is either a wrestler themselves or a famous martial artist (such as Tito Ortiz in the main event at TNA's THard Justice in 2005). <a2_0>They also have the power to eject from ringside any of the heel wrestler's entourage/stable, who may otherwise interfere with the match.
